<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><br>You know, it sounded to me like that guy was slamming all of it.  Even EVPs.  Although I'm fine with Chris Moon bashing :)  It just sounded like he was saying all of it was useless.<br><br>Don<br><br>--- On <b>Fri, 11/7/08, M.A. Coletta (Mike) <i><michaelcoletta@...></i></b> wrote:<br><blockquote style="border-left: 2px solid rgb(16, 16, 255); margin-left: 5px; padding-left: 5px;">From: M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...><br>Subject: [EVP-ITC] Chris Moon and his use of Franks Box gets slammed<br>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<br>Date: Friday, November 7, 2008, 9:42 AM<br><br><div id="yiv1428593549">





    <div id="ygrp-text">
            <p></p><p>Chris Moon and his use of Franks Box gets slammed</p>
<p>Last night on Coast to Coast AM George Noory had Dr. Stephen Rorke on-air.  He discussed the field of instrumental transcommunication (ITC), his study of the Spiricom case, Frank's Box, and EVP capture.<br>It was during his discussion of Frank's Box where he brought up the name Chris Moon.  He also brought up exactly what he thought of Chris Moon's use of the Franks Box he calls his telephone to the dead.<br>Better than writng about it, I've placed a link to the audio from last night, at my post below.</p>
<p><a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://ufomagazine.blogspot.com/2008/11/chris-moon-and-his-use-of-franks-box.html">http://ufomagazine. blogspot. com/2008/ 11/chris- moon-and- his-use-of- franks-box. html</a></p>
<p>- Mike (UFO Geek)</p>

    </div>  


	 
	
	</div></blockquote></td></tr></table>
